title: Seachasers
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Oceanfront restaurant, bar and music hall with several vegan choices on the menu. Has been reported to HappyCow that vegan small plates include buffalo cauliflower and fresh summer rolls; vegan salads include kale salad and chopped salad; vegan sides include Caribbean rice and island slaw; vegan sandwiches are blackened tempeh and a veggie burger; vegan dinner entree is Mediterranean pasta; vegan dessert is apple enchilada. Since it is unclear on the online menu which items are vegan and which items are vegetarian, vegans please inquire to be sure.
